Title: Aa Dinagalu
Writer: Girish Karnad (screenplay), Agni Shridhar (screenplay), Agni Shridhar (story)
Actors: Chethan Kumar, Archana, Sharath Lohitashwa, Ashish Vidyarthi
Plot: Based on the non-fictional novel "Dadagiri Dinagalu", an affluent youth is dragged into the 1980s Bangalore underworld to save his love from his conspiring father.
